name: Crash Maker
description: Crash is back in a 2.5d #platformer where you can even build your own levels in!With as accuarate as possible physics (including: sliding, crouching, spinning and more)Crash #Maker will be fun & challenging to play!There are 3 example levevels already in the game ready to be beaten!With an easy to use level editor you can create your own levels instantly!
